DOC.brief_summary: This single arm study will assess the efficacy and safety of quarterly intravenous Bonviva in women with post-menopausal osteoporosis. All patients will receive Bonviva 3mg i.v. every 3 months. The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months, and the target sample size is 100 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Quarterly Intravenous Bonviva (Ibandronate) in Women With Post-Menopausal Osteoporosis.
DOC.criteria: postmenopausal women with osteoporosis; <=80 years of age; naive to oral bisphosphonates, or have discontinued daily and/or weekly bisphosphonate treatment for >1 year. metabolic bone disease other than postmenopausal osteoporosis; treatment with other drugs affecting bone metabolism within last 6 months; previous or current malignant disease (except for adequately treated cancer in situ of the cervix, or basal or squamous cell skin cancer).
